thread.section_title: Wesley Chapel Toyota Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wesley Chapel Toyota | www.wesleychapeltoyota.com
thread.title: Ron Schaller
thread.title_full: Wesley Chapel Toyota reviewed by Ron Schaller

author: Ron Schaller
title: Ron Schaller
text: I have dealt with a wide variety of car dealerships and salespersons over the last 50 years, but none have spiked my satisfaction level as much as Wesley Chapel and Christopher Joseph. Chris contacted me within minutes of an online inquiry with the pertinent information I needed. That was the beginning of a very smooth and productive search/purchase process, resulting in my wife and I driving home in a new Highlander yesterday. I can't say enough good things about Mr. Joseph; or should I say I can't think of one thing to say about him that is a negative. From my perspective, this gentleman is a huge asset to Wesley Chapel. I recommend that if you're in the market for a new vehicle, ask for him first. Simply put, he's a nice guy... friendly, very helpful, straightforward, and fair. Wesley Chapel advertises that they strive to develop long term relationships with customers. From what we've seen, they're doing it well... with people like Chris leading the way.
